title: Wire Parquet Flooring media into existing Services gallery system

requirements.summary: Add the generated Parquet Flooring static image asset to the public generated assets directory.
acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/parquet-flooring-001.dim_1600x1200.jpg.
The app can load the image via the existing public asset loading approach (served from the frontend public directory).

file_operations.description: Add the generated image asset for Parquet Flooring exactly at frontend/public/assets/generated/parquet-flooring-001.dim_1600x1200.jpg so it is served as a static public asset.

requirements.summary: Add a Parquet Flooring gallery item so MediaStrip can render it by category.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/content/galleryMedia.ts includes at least one new GalleryItem with category set to "parquet-flooring".
The new GalleryItem references the generated parquet flooring image path "assets/generated/parquet-flooring-001.dim_1600x1200.jpg".
The GalleryItem id is unique within galleryMedia.

file_operations.description: Append a new GalleryItem entry for the "parquet-flooring" category with a unique id (e.g., "parquet-flooring-001"), type "image", an appropriate title, and path set to "assets/generated/parquet-flooring-001.dim_1600x1200.jpg" so the existing MediaStrip component can resolve and render it via publicAsset().

requirements.summary: Wire the Parquet Flooring Additional Offerings card to the Parquet Flooring media category so it renders a MediaStrip on the Services page.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/content/services.ts sets the Parquet Flooring additionalOfferings entry mediaCategory to "parquet-flooring".
On the Services page, the Parquet Flooring card in Additional Offerings renders a MediaStrip and displays the parquet flooring media item(s).

file_operations.description: Update the "Parquet Flooring" entry in additionalOfferings to include mediaCategory: "parquet-flooring" so the existing Services page logic conditionally renders MediaStrip for that card.
